name: The Deep HUM (Intro)
description:
THE WORLD IS FALLING APART

Get ready for the ultimate horror experience with The Deep HUM, a retro-style game blending survival horror, psychological thriller, and action. As you fight for your life against grotesque creatures, you'll need to keep your wits about you and make tough decisions that could impact the outcome of the game. The immersive atmosphere and pulse-pounding action will have you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to face the horrors of The Deep HUM?

What to expect?

Some features are limited, such as adjusting the controls.

The Deep HUM is still in development, this is just an early prototype (there isn't much to do with it yet). If you want to support the project, head over to Twitter and show some love!
